Package com.giift.sdk.io.wallet

This package contains all the interfaces with the server for the user (wallet) api.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdminContent  
    AdminContent.Content
    Server request, that will update on the GiiftProvider the content associated to admin (e.g Privacy policy / Terms & Conditions and insert/update
    Card
    Class handling the card synchronizations with the server
    Card.Add  
    Card.Barcode
    Server request that will fetch the barcode associated to a specific card.
    Card.Delete
    Set card status to deleted locally and try to update it on the server Set appropriate sync_status to keep track if the server and local db are in sync
    Card.FetchAll
    Fetch All user cards that have been updated since the last update
    Card.FetchOne  
    Card.PostUpdate
    First updates card values in the local db, then try to update it on the server set the sync_status appropriately
    Card.SyncTransactions
    Server request that will fetch all transactions linked to a card from the server and update it locally.
    Card.Track
    Server request that will trigger a track value request to the program website.
    CardAdd
    This features helps adding a program to the users portfolio.
    CardAdd.Init  
    CardAdd.Step  
    Conversion
    Utility class which contains all the server interface related to conversion
    Conversion.Sync
    Server request, that will update on the GiiftProvider the definition of all conversions related to a specific Dmo
    Country
    Utility class that gathers the querying of Countries to/from the server
    Country.SyncAll  
    Coupon
    Class handling the different interactions with the server regarding Coupon
    Coupon.SyncFromCard
    Method that is used to get a list of cards attached to a specific Card
    Coupon.SyncFromDmo
    Method that is used to get a list of coupons attached to a specific Dmo
    Currency
    Utility class that gathers the querying of Currencies to/from the server.
    Currency.SyncAll
    Server request to fetch all currencies and Update the GiiftProvider
    Dmo
    Class that gathers the methods used to query the server to manipulate the Dmo
    Dmo.About  
    Dmo.ReadAll  
    Dmo.SyncAll  
    Dmo.SyncOne  
    DmoSetting  
    DmoSetting.SyncDmoSettings  
    Location
    Utility class that gathers the querying of Locations from the server.
    Location.SyncAll  
    LocationSetting  
    LocationSetting.SyncAll  
    News
    Class handling the synchronization of News with the server.
    News.SyncFromCard  
    News.SyncFromDmo  
    Product  
    Product.SyncFromCard  
    Product.SyncFromDmo  
    Retailer  
    Retailer.DistTo  
    RetailerContent  
    RetailerContent.SyncAll  
    User
    This class implements all the User related request to the server.
    User.Authenticate  
    User.ForgotPassword  
    User.GetCurrentUser  
    User.GetPortfolioValue  
    User.IsLogged  
    User.KeepAlive  
    User.Logout  
    User.PostUpdate  
    User.RegisterPushPlayerId  
    User.SocialAuthenticate  
    User.SocialLink  
    User.SocialUnlink  
    Utils  

Package com.giift.sdk.io.wallet Description

This package contains all the interfaces with the server for the user (wallet) api.
